text: Šimanovci () is a village in Serbia. It is situated in the Pećinci municipality, in the Srem District, Vojvodina province. The village has a Serb ethnic majority and its population numbering 3,358 people (2002 census). ==Name== The name of the town in Serbian is in the plural, and therefore it is grammatically correct to refer to it as "Šimanovci are" instead of "Šimanovci is". A hypothetical singular version of the name would be Šimanovac. ==External links== "simanovci.rs" Portal of Šimanovci ==See also== *List of places in Serbia *List of cities, towns and villages in Vojvodina Category:Populated places in Syrmia
title: Šimanovci
